text: The Costa Rica women's national under 17 football team represents Costa Rica in youth international football. They have appeared in two FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup in 2008 and hosted the 2014 edition. ==Competitive record== ===FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup=== The team has qualified in 2008 and 2014 as host.FIFA U-17 HistoryFIFA U-17 Women's World Cup Year Round Position 2008 Group stage 15th 3 0 0 3 1 8 2010 Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify 2012 Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify 2014 Group stage 15th 3 0 0 3 1 6 2016 Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify 2018 Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify 2022 Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify 2024 Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify 2025 To be determined To be determined To be determined To be determined To be determined To be determined To be determined To be determined Total 2/9 15th 6 0 0 6 2 14 ===CONCACAF Women's U-17 Championship=== Year Result Matches Wins Draws Losses GF GA 2008 Runners-up 5 2 1 2 11 11 2010 Fourth place 5 2 0 3 10 19 2012 Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify 2013 Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify Did not qualify 2016 Group stage 3 1 0 2 5 8 2018 Group stage 3 1 0 2 7 7 2022 Quarter-finals 5 3 0 2 14 10 2024 Group stage 3 0 1 2 3 5 Total 6/8 24 9 2 13 50 60 ==References== Category:National under-17 football teams Category:Football in Costa Rica Category:National sports teams of Costa Rica
